star_conditions: Sink all Fleets on the map

normal.title: Light in the Dark
normal.introduction: Helena's guns lit up the night sky, scattering light across the violent waters. Her position is exposed.
star_conditions: Sink all Fleets on the map

hard.title: 黑夜中的光芒
hard.introduction: 海伦娜炮口的火舌照亮了夜晚的海面，她将火力毫无保留的倾泻在敌人身上，然而，却也因此暴露了自己的位置...
star_conditions: Sink all Fleets on the map

normal.title: Helena
normal.introduction: The enemy's destroyers showed some serious skill when fighting during the night. Heads up!
star_conditions: Sink all Fleets on the map

hard.title: 海伦娜
hard.introduction: 敌方的新型驱逐舰展现出了不同以往的夜战实力，多枚鱼雷准确的命中了海伦娜，战斗陷入一片混乱。
star_conditions: Sink all Fleets on the map

normal.title: Once More, Sortie Again!
normal.introduction: Less than a week after the Battle of Kula Gulf, the Sakura Fleet reassembled again to launch a covert transport operation to the Kolombangara Islands. Task Force 18, led by Honolulu and St Louis, was once again instructed to intercept the transport.
star_conditions: Sink all Fleets on the map
normal.additional_notes: Once the boss shows up, it will spawn a chain of several suicide boats in a horizontal formation against your fleet which aims straight at your flagship.

normal.title: Preemptive Strike
normal.introduction: Our PBY recons have detected enemy forces to the south. However, they had already detected our radar signals first. The night battle is about to commence!
star_conditions: Sink all Fleets on the map
normal.additional_notes: The boss is escorted by 2 Heavy Cruisers which shield it from your escort ships. Best way to handle it is to have Battleships/Battlecruisers that can target the boss directly.

normal.title: Press the Attack
normal.introduction: Under the cover of night, the Sakura fleet scored several hits on our light cruisers with their prized oxygen torpedoes. However, their flagship, Jintsuu, has been heavily damaged concentrated fire from 152mm cannons, and is now retreating.
star_conditions: Sink all Fleets on the map
normal.additional_notes: Enemy Boss is backed by 2 Battleships who will directly attack your backline ships, whereas the Boss will continuously spawn a volley of torpedoes. Over time some Suicide Boats will appear and head straight for your flagship.

normal.title: Counterattack
normal.introduction: Just as Honolulu and St. Louis were seizing on the advantage, a Sakura torpedo squadron emerged from the cover of darkness to launch a vicious counterattack! Honolulu and St. Louis have been struck by torpedoes, and the situation is critical!
star_conditions: Sink all Fleets on the map

normal.title: Landing Operation
normal.introduction: We have successfully drawn the enemy fleet's attention towards our air wings. Come morning, we should be able to anchor at Bougainville Island!
star_conditions: Sink all Fleets on the map

normal.title: Stormy Night
normal.introduction: A Sakura Empire fleet has been sighted advancing quickly through the storm! Only Task Force 39, exhausted after several consecutive battles, can stop them...
star_conditions: Sink all Fleets on the map

normal.title: Knights of the Sea

star_conditions: Sink all Fleets on the map

normal.title: Part the Night
normal.introduction: The gallant Knights of the Sea stand face to face with the Sakura Empire's relentless heavy cruisers. The clouds in the night sky will be parted not by sunlight, but by boundless cannon fire!
star_conditions: Sink all Fleets on the map

normal.title: Information Warfare

star_conditions: Sink all Fleets on the map

normal.title: Ambush

star_conditions: Sink all Fleets on the map

normal.title: Carrier Showdown

star_conditions: Sink all Fleets on the map

normal.title: Task Force
normal.introduction: War has changed. Victory favors those who have gained air superiority. Launch your planes and seize control of the Mariana skies!
star_conditions: Sink all Fleets on the map

normal.title: 激战的长空
normal.introduction: 敌方的第一波航空队即将进入防空圈！猎物已经落入陷阱，TF58，起飞迎击！
star_conditions: Sink all Fleets on the map

normal.title: 羽栖之鹤
normal.introduction: 伴随着悠远的笛声，敌方的第二波攻击袭来！这是第几次交手了呢，翔鹤？
star_conditions: Sink all Fleets on the map

normal.title: 奋起之鹤
normal.introduction: 在潜艇的帮助下，我方已获得了相当的优势。然而来自五航战的宿敌——瑞鹤，却在此时发起了新一轮的猛烈攻势！
star_conditions: Sink all Fleets on the map

normal.title: 起舞之凤
normal.introduction: 最后的对决！目标是敌方旗舰，以重型装甲为傲的最新锐航母——大凤，慎重地进行战斗吧！
star_conditions: Sink all Fleets on the map
